info.title: CarConfigurator API
info.description: Comprehensive car configuration API with internationalization, user management, and admin features. Fully compliant with OpenAPI 3.1.1 specification for Robot Framework training and automation testing.

imageUrl.description: Car image URL (can be relative or absolute)
Option image URL (can be relative or absolute)

exclusiveGroup.description: Exclusive group - options in the same group are mutually exclusive

isRequired.description: Indicates whether the option is required

userId.description: ID of the user who created the configuration

isRequired.description: Indicates whether the option is required

optionIds.description: Array of option IDs to validate

carId.description: Optional: Car ID for context-specific validation

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

id.description: Unique identifier for the required group

isRequired.description: Whether this group is required for configurations
Whether this group should be required

userId.description: ID of the user to delete

imageUrl.description: Option image URL (can be relative or absolute)

isExclusive.description: Whether this option is exclusive to one selection

get.summary: Get all cars with all translations (admin only)
get.description: Retrieves all cars with all translations for admin management

delete.summary: Delete all demo users and their configurations
delete.description: Deletes demo users (identified by isRegistered = false) and their associated configurations (admin only)

200.description: Demo users and configurations deleted successfully

get.summary: Get all options with all translations (admin only)
get.description: Retrieves all options with all translations for admin management
Retrieves all users with optional statistics (admin only)

parameters.name: includeStats
parameters.description: Include configuration statistics for each user

delete.description: Deletes a user and all associated configurations (admin only)

get.description: Verifies if the current user session is authenticated

post.description: Authenticates an administrator and creates a session
Logs out the current admin session and clears the session cookie

get.description: Returns the current user's data if the provided token is valid
Retrieves a specific car by ID
Retrieves a list of all available cars with optional localization
Retrieves a specific configuration with car and options

delete.description: Deletes a configuration and all associated options

get.description: Retrieve all configurations for a specific user

post.description: Create a new car configuration with selected options
Updates the user's preferred language locale (de or en)

get.description: Retrieves all options that conflict with the specified option

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: option ID to check conflicts for

get.description: Retrieves a specific option with translations
Retrieves all options with translations grouped by category

post.description: Creates a new option with translations (admin only)
Checks if all required options are selected for a given car configuration
Checks if the selected options are compatible with each other

get.description: Retrieves all exclusive groups and their required status

put.description: Updates whether an exclusive group is required for configurations

get.description: Creates a unique demo user for testing purposes

post.description: Creates or retrieves a user session for demo purposes
